Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents an item available for sale in the e-commerce store.

description.description: A detailed description of the product.

price.description: The price of the product in INR.

category.description: The category the product belongs to (e.g., 'Fashion', 'Electronics').

stock.description: The number of items in stock.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the product's image.

rating.description: The average customer rating for the product (from 0 to 5).

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the product was created.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a customer or administrator of the store.

email.description: The user's email address, used for login.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a completed transaction by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who placed the order.

items.description: An array of products included in the order.

totalAmount.description: The total cost of the order.

shippingAddress.description: The address where the order was shipped.

status.description: The current status of the order.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the order was placed.

Review.title: Review
Review.description: A customer's review and rating for a product.

userId.description: The ID of the user who wrote the review.

productId.description: The ID of the product being reviewed.

rating.description: The rating given by the user (from 1 to 5).

comment.description: The text content of the review.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns the cart.

items.description: An array of items in the cart.

/products/{productId}/reviews/{reviewId}.description: Stores reviews for a specific product.

/users/{userId}/cart.description: Stores the user's shopping cart. Should be a single document.
